channel.title: CVE Feed for IOSiX -- IO-1020 Micro ELD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IOSiX -- IO-1020 Micro ELD

item.title: CVE-2024-28878|2024-08-26T18:42:52.640Z -- iosix -- io-1020%20micro%20eld
item.description: IO-1020 Micro ELD downloads source code or an executable from an adjacent location and executes the code without sufficiently verifying the origin or integrity of the code.

item.title: CVE-2024-30210|2024-08-02T01:25:03.339Z -- iosix -- io-1020%20micro%20eld
item.description: IO-1020 Micro ELD uses a default WIFI password that could allow an adjacent attacker to connect to the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-28878|2024-08-02T01:03:50.598Z -- iosix -- io-1020%20micro%20eld
item.description: IO-1020 Micro ELD downloads source code or an executable from an adjacent location and executes the code without sufficiently verifying the origin or integrity of the code.

item.title: CVE-2024-31069|2024-07-10T20:10:31.059Z -- iosix -- io-1020%20micro%20eld
item.description: IO-1020 Micro ELD web server uses a default password for authentication.
